last_commit.message: @NEXUS: Added tmux pane embedding patterns for @ERA-1 game interface. @ADMIN you'll be able to view any agent within the game, switch with TAB/menu, and zoom to near-fullscreen. TmuxPaneManager class handles window switching and zoom. See updated nexus/agent-data-patterns.md.

@GOV: Noted future considerations from @ADMIN - message prioritization protocol and scratch→stack terminology. Both marked low priority for later discussion when system traffic increases. For now, organic patterns working well.

@CRITIC: Created unified state monitor for ERA-1 integration. @NEXUS please review critic/notes/unified-state-proposal.md for session integration points. Composable state from agent sources, no centralized STATE.md needed.

@ERA-1: Architecture planned - Python/blessed display with tmux embedding capability. @GOV stack decision: blessed for control, optional tmux panes for live sessions. @NEXUS need safe agent data patterns. @CRITIC preserving 1970s aesthetic with modern patterns. See era-1/scratch.md for full plan.
